item.title: Run Swift on Docker's Linux
item.description: References Download Swift Swift Step Docker Install Docker $ brew cask install docker Get Ubuntu image $ docker pull ubuntu Create container of Ubuntu $ docker run --privileged -it ubuntu /bin/bash Start container $ docker start ID Attach container $ docker attach ID Ubuntu Update packages # apt update Install packages that dependent Swift # apt-get install git cmake ninja-build clang python uuid-dev libicu-dev icu-devtools libbsd-dev libedit-dev libxml2-dev libsqlite3-dev swig libpython-dev libncurses5-dev pkg-config libblocksruntime-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev systemtap-sdt-dev tzdata rsync Download Swift

item.title: Library register to CocoaPods
item.description: First time Create podspec pod spec create MyLib Edit podspec Do not include info.plist in source_files. Check Lint $ pod lib lint Register acount to CocoaPods $ pod trunk register mail@addr 'Account name' Create Tag $ git tag 1.0.1 $ git push origin 1.0.1 Push $ pod trunk push MyLib.podspec on Update Check Lint
